en.cats: I have {numCats, number} cats. Almost {pctBlack, number, percent} of them are black.
en.sale: Sale begins {start, date, medium}, at {time, time, short}. Everything is {price, number, USD}.
en.bananas: {name} ate {num, plural, =0 {no bananas} =1 {a banana} other {# bananas}} {gender, select, male {at his house.} female {at her house.} other {at their house.}}

fr.cats: J'ai {numCats, number} chats. Près de {pctBlack, number, percent} sont noirs.
fr.sale: Vente commence {start, date, medium} à {time, time, short}. Tout est {price, number, USD}.
fr.fruit: {num, plural, =0 {pas de pommes} =1 {une pomme} other {# pommes}}
fr.bananas: {name} mange {num, plural, =0 {pas de bananes} =1 {une banane} other {# bananes}} {gender, select, male {chez lui.} female {chez elle.} other {chez leur.}}
